node.name: Quiz
node.rich_text:
1.) Which part of the CIA triad deals with ensuring the same data saved onto storage is retrieved at a later date without changes? Ans.) Integrity
2.) Which part of the CIA triad deals with only allowing authorized users to access certain data? Ans.) Confidentiality
3.) Which regulation deals with healthcare information in the United States? Ans.) HIPAA
4.) What privacy regulation applies specifically to organizations doing business in the EU and EEA? Ans.) GDPR
5.) Which cybersecurity framework was designed to protect Microsoft Windows-based networks? Ans.) ASD Essential 8
6.) Which framework includes a business focus and generic processes for management of IT? Ans.) COBIT
7.) Which framework focuses on mitigating the most prevalent cyber-attacks? Ans.) CIS Controls and CIS Benchmarks
8.) What is the most important part of a penetration test? Ans.) A report that brings value to the customer
9.) What is not usually performed during an audit? Ans.) Penetration test
